text: Hagi kanti kama hanagati'za ankerontre trohuntetere hazageno, zanavugosa tofe zafa humitere hu'na'e. Hagi ana ankerontremofona, mago kaziga vahe avugosa huntegeno, mago kaziga'a laioni avugosa hunte'neankino, tofe zafa amunompi me'negeno zanavugosa ohumi ahumi hu'na'e. Ana hu'zanke hu'za ana mono nomofona mekagi'naze.
